name: Fuzai no Gakusei
description: Fuzai no Gakusei is a Horror Game Experience from a team of developers from Fitchburg State University. It takes place in an abandoned school in 2008, where a teenager is exploring the not-so-empty halls to figure out the truth of what happened the year prior. There are around ten audio cassette tapes for the player to discover, as well as keys to open doors, expanding the explorable area. There's an evil spirit that lurks the halls, so keep your wits about you as you uncover the truth.
